bwwExcerpt: Robert Hastie provides the frenzied “Mincemeat” direction. It forced someone behind me to whisper halfway through Act 1, “This is exhausting.” Nothing kills a laugh faster than seeing actors sweat.

keyPhrases.quote: Nothing kills a laugh faster than seeing actors sweat
